description: Starting up the application takes a good 15-30 seconds. Once setting the default applications for editing/folders/browsing, when right clicking on a result and clicking edit, the app crashes. I verified the paths to the executables were correct using "whereis". I don't recommend using this tool until an update is provided.
summary: Bad performance and crashes on Ubuntu 19.10

description: Searchmonkey really helped me find some specific files and other data. Especially the search function that searches within files comes in handy.
Excelente, já uso a muitos anos para achar nomes de variaveis/conteudo dentros dos meus códigos. De forma recursiva
Really easy to use, to understand and the queries are as speed as light. Thank you !
summary: Easy to use and rapid application

description:
It was fast, reliable and it was one of the best out there.

Now it crashes all the time unless used from a fresh reboot.

I don't know if it is the computer, the Ubuntu OS, or the software it's self - but it just outright crashes 50% of the time, and when restarted it is locked into the OLD search and stays that way until the next reboot.

It's a pity because I really liked it and we were a good fit.

Because it outright crashes (Poof! Gone) so often it's basically unuseable - which is a real disappointment.

I'd like to see it get fixed up and made fully fantastic once again.
summary: I used to use it all the time

description:
Absolute garbage!
It gives an error message complaining about its own date format which it sets itself and cannot be changed anyway!
Unusable!
summary: Cannot read its own date format!

description: Ausreichend für die schnelle Suche nach Dateien oder String Inhalten in Dateien!

L'icône dans la barre unity ou la liste des programmes installés est invisible, ou plus exactement "vide". Elle n'est pas absente, elle est constitué d'une zone sans rien. C'est un petit bug, constaté avec Ubuntu 20.04, qui ne gêne pas l'utilisation du programme, mais qui reste d'autant plus dommage qu'unity ne permet pas d'un simple clic droit par défaut de modifier cette icône transparente.
